content:
Sounds like a plan!

Go ahead and update the StreamMax app to the latest version, and then try connecting to the service again. If you're still experiencing the "Authentication Failed" error, then try disabling and re-enabling the app as I suggested earlier.

Remember to restart your TV and StreamMax device (if it's a separate device) after updating the app, just to ensure everything is refreshed.

If you're still having trouble after trying these steps, we can explore additional troubleshooting options or potential issues with your StreamMax account or TV settings.

Take your time, and let me know the outcome. I'll be here to help you further if needed!
